name: Dancing Lights
description: Create a wisp of light that illuminates a 12 m / 40 ft radius.
buff: Illuminates a 9m/30ft radius area for 10 turns. Requires Concentration.

name: Eldritch Blast
description: Conjure a beam of crackling energy. The spell creates more than one beam when you reach higher levels.

name: Fire Bolt
description: Hurl a mote of fire at an enemy as a ranged attack, dealing 1d10 Fire damage if it hits.

name: Light
description: Infuse an object with an aura of light. Only affects one target at a time.
buff: Target object emits bright light in a 9m / 30ft radius for 100 turns.

name: Ray of Frost
description: Call forth a frigid beam of blue light. Deals 1d8 Cold damage and reduces the target's Movement Speed by 3m / 10ft for 2 turns.
debuff: Reduces the target's Movement Speed by 3m / 10ft for 1 turn.

name: Sacred Flame
description: Engulf a target in a flame-like radiance that deals 1d8 Radiant damage.

name: Shocking Grasp
description: Lightning springs from your hand. It deals 1d8 Lightning damage and prevents the target from taking Reactions. You have Advantage when using this spell on creatures wearing metal Armour.
debuff: Target cannot take Reactions until the start of its next turn.

name: Burning Hands
description: Fire shoots from your outstretched fingers. It ignites anything flammable and deals 3d6 Fire damage. On a successful save, targets still take half damage.

name: Chromatic Orb
description: Hurl a sphere of energy that deals 3d8 Thunder damage and possibly creates a surface on impact. Alternatively, choose a different type of damage.

name: Cure Wounds
description: Heal a creature you can touch.
buff: Target regains 1d8+2 hit points. Has no effect on undead or constructs.

name: Divine Favour
description: Your prayer empowers you with divine radiance. Your weapons deal an additional 1d4 Radiant damage.
damage: Weapon attacks deal an extra 1d4 Radiant damage
buff: Caster's weapon attacks deal an additional 1d4 Radiant damage for 3 turns. Requires Concentration.

name: Faerie Fire
description: Encase multiple targets in colorful light. The targets turn visible, and Attack Rolls against the target have Advantage.
buff: All attacks against affected targets have Advantage for 10 turns. Requires Concentration.
debuff: Targets cannot benefit from Invisibility. Attack Rolls against them have Advantage.

name: Guiding Bolt
description: Call forth a beam of light that deals 4d6 Radiant damage. The next Attack Roll against this target has Advantage.
debuff: The next Attack Roll against the target has Advantage for 2 turns.

name: Healing Word
description: Heal a creature you can see.
buff: Target regains 1d4 hit points. Has no effect on undead or constructs.

name: Hellish Rebuke
description: The next time you take damage, you use your Reaction to surround your attacker in hellish flames that deal 2d10 Fire damage. On a successful save, the target still takes half damage.

name: Magic Missile
description: Shoot 3 magical darts, each dealing 2d4+1 Force damage. They always hit their target.

name: Searing Smite
description: Your weapon flares with white-hot intensity. It deals an extra 1d6 Fire damage and marks the target with Searing Smite. A target with Searing Smite takes 1d6 Fire damage every turn, until it succeeds on a Constitution Saving Throw.
damage: Initial: Weapon damage + 1d6 Fire. Subsequent: 1d6 Fire per turn.
debuff: Target is marked with Searing Smite, taking 1d6 Fire damage at the start of each of its turns unless it makes a Constitution Save.

name: Thunderous Smite
description: Your weapon attacks deal an extra 2d6 Thunder damage and pushes your target 3m away and possibly knocks it Prone.
debuff: Target is pushed 3m away and may be knocked Prone (Str Save).

name: Thunderwave
description: Release a wave of thunderous force that deals 2d8 Thunder damage and pushes away all creatures and objects.
debuff: Targets are pushed away from the caster.

name: Witch Bolt
description: Link yourself to a target with a bolt of lightning. Deals an additional 1d12 Lightning damage each turn by activating it.
damage: Initial: 1d12 Lightning. Subsequent: 1d12 Lightning per turn when activated.
debuff: Remains connected to target, dealing damage each turn. Ends if target moves out of range or breaks line of sight.

name: Wrathful Smite
description: Your weapon attacks deal an extra 1d6 Psychic damage and possibly Frightens your target. They will be easier to hit and cannot move.
debuff: Target may become Frightened (Wis Save), causing it to have Disadvantage on Ability Checks and Attack Rolls, and cannot move closer to the caster.

name: Branding Smite
description: Your weapon gleams with astral radiance as you strike and possibly marks your target with light, preventing it from turning invisible. It deals an extra 2d6 Radiant damage.
debuff: Target is marked with light, preventing it from becoming Invisible.

name: Darkness
description: Create a cloud of magical darkness to Heavily Obscure and Blind creatures within. Creatures cannot make ranged attacks into or out of the darkness.
buff: Can be used to obscure your party from enemy ranged attacks. Warlocks with Devil's Sight can see through it.
debuff: Heavily Obscures and Blinds creatures inside the cloud for 10 turns. They cannot make ranged attacks into or out of it. Requires Concentration.

name: Flame Blade
description: Conjure a flaming scimitar in your hand that deals 3d6 Fire damage. It sheds a bright light in a 3m / 10ft radius and a dim light in a 6m / 20ft radius.
buff: Creates a flaming scimitar for melee attacks. Provides light. Requires Concentration.

name: Gust of Wind
description: Summon a strong wind that clears all clouds and pushes creatures back 5m, forcing them Off Balance.
buff: Clears clouds and gas effects from an area.
debuff: Pushes creatures back 5m and inflicts Off Balance. Requires Concentration.

name: Melf's Acid Arrow
description: Shoot a green arrow that covers the target and the ground with acid. Deals 4d4 Acid damage immediately and 2d4 Acid damage at the end of the target's turn.
debuff: Target takes additional Acid damage at the end of its next turn. On miss, still deals half initial damage.

name: Moonbeam
description: Call down a beam of light that damages any creature that enters the beam or starts its turn in the light. You can use an action to move the beam 18m.
debuff: Damages creatures in the beam each turn. Can be moved each turn. Requires Concentration.

name: Prayer of Healing
description: Heal all allies you can see.
buff: All visible allies regain 2d8+2 hit points. Has no effect on undead or constructs.

name: Scorching Ray
description: Hurl 3 rays of fire. Each ray deals 2d6 Fire damage.

name: Shatter
description: Generate a painfully intense ringing noise that deals 3d8 Thunder damage to all nearby creatures and objects. Creatures made of inorganic material such as stone have Disadvantage on their Saving Throw.

name: Spiritual Weapon
description: Summon a floating, spectral weapon that attacks your enemies alongside you.
buff: Summons a weapon that attacks enemies as a Bonus Action. Does not require Concentration.

name: Blinding Smite
description: Evoke a heavenly flare when you hit with a weapon attack, dealing an extra 3d8 Radiant damage and possibly Blinding your target.

name: Crusader's Mantle
description: Radiate a holy power that emboldens nearby allies. Their weapon attacks deal an additional 1d4 Radiant damage.
damage: Allies' weapon attacks deal an extra 1d4 Radiant damage
buff: Allies within 9m deal an additional 1d4 Radiant damage with weapon attacks. Requires Concentration.

name: Daylight
description: Enchant an item to shine like the sun or summon a sphere of sunlight that dispels all darkness around it.
buff: Creates bright light in a 18m radius and dispels magical darkness.

name: Fireball
description: Shoot a bright flame from your fingers that explodes upon contact, torching everything in the vicinity with 8d6 Fire damage.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: Call forth a blast of lightning that deals 8d6 Lightning damage to all creatures in the line of the eruption.

name: Mass Healing Word
description: Heal up to 6 allies you can see.
buff: Up to 6 visible allies regain 1d4+4 hit points.

name: Warden of Vitality
description: While this aura lasts, you can cast Restore Vitality as a bonus action to heal yourself or nearby allies.
buff: Allows the caster to heal themselves or allies within 3m for 1d6 each turn as a Bonus Action. Requires Concentration.

name: Fire Shield
description: Wreathe your body in flames that shed light in a 3m radius, provide Resistance to Fire or Cold damage, and retaliate against melee attacks.
damage: 2d8 Fire or Cold damage to melee attackers
buff: Caster gains Resistance to Fire or Cold damage and deals damage to melee attackers. Lasts 10 turns.

name: Ice Storm
description: Impel a storm of hail and ice to crash from the sky, dealing 2d8 Bludgeoning and 4d6 Cold damage, covering the ground and striking all objects and creatures within range.
debuff: Creates an ice surface that may cause creatures to fall Prone.

name: Otiluke's Resilient Sphere
description: Enclose a target in a sphere of shimmering force, reducing its movement speed by half, and blocking all incoming and outgoing damage.
buff: Can protect an ally by enclosing them in an invulnerable sphere.
debuff: Traps an enemy in an invulnerable sphere, preventing them from dealing or receiving damage. Requires Concentration.
